hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

### Always Free, Open to All

### Parking & Accessibility

Street parking in front of the Dayton Arcade and the meters on Pretzinger Lane are first come first serve. Additional Parking at the Reibold Building Garage; enter at 25 W 5th Street, $2 for the first hour.

Motorists are now able to pay for street metered parking electronically via their smartphones, using the **Passport Parking** app. The Passport Parking app is free to download from the App Store and Google Play. Users can also manage parking at [passportparking.com](http://passportparking.com/). There is a $0.30 convenience fee per credit/debit card transaction. The existing cash and credit card payment options at parking meters will continue to be available.

[Downtown Dayton Parking Map](http://www.downtowndayton.org/parking-transportation)

### [Plan Your Visit](https://codayton.org/visit/)

#### GALLERY & CoSHOP HOURS:

WED – SAT / 11 AM – 6 PM  
CLOSED SUN, MON & TUES

#### GET IN TOUCH

25 W 4th Street  
Dayton, OH 45402

[937/224.3822](tel:+19372243822)

[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#d1b2bebfa5b0b2a591b2beb5b0a8a5bebfffbea3b6)

[Sign up for The Co's Newsletter](https://lp.constantcontactpages.com/su/1m7fsqL/TheCoList)

#### THE CONTEMPORARY DAYTON

The Contemporary Dayton is a non-profit gallery and artist resource that provides art for the community and a community for artists since 1991.

### [Shop The Co](https://codayton.org/shop/)

[](https://the-co-dayton.myshopify...
admission_text:
## Memberships

# MEMBERSHIP

Membership at The Contemporary Dayton places you at the forefront of compelling contemporary art and ideas, featuring the work of both regionally and nationally acclaimed artists.

Corporate/Community Membership

**All Members enjoy exclusive access to special programs, exhibition previews, conversations with artists and curators, family activities, discounts to tickets events, a 10% discount in the CoSHOP, and so much more. Your membership—whether Individual or Corporate—helps sustain and grow a vibrant cultural landscape in Dayton and beyond.**

Since 1991, The Contemporary Dayton (The Co) has presented hundreds of exhibitions and programs, engaging tens of thousands of visitors. Today, our dedication to our core programs—Exhibitions, Public Programs, and Artist Professional Development—extends into the community through Public Art commissions and Social Innovation initiatives, all designed to spark curiosity, foster dialogue, and expand access to contemporary art through free programs and community collaborations.

Thanks to the generous support of our Members, The Contemporary Dayton is making a tangible impact—both within the community and across our network of artists. Please join us in recognizing the transformative power of the arts and become a member today.

[JOIN / RENEW YEARLY MEMBERSHIP](https://app.etapestry.com/onlineforms/DaytonVisualArtsCenter/gen-membership-form-1.html)

[JOIN / RENEW MONTHLY MEMBERSHIP](https://app.etapestry.co...
